name: Graves over the Hills
description:
Combat Keybinds:

  • Down Arrow - Crouch
  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • Spacebar - Shoot

Game made for GameDevTV Game Jam 2022.

Theme: Death is only the beginning.

Credits:
